title: SOLD - T206 Collins and Griffith SGC graded.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: SOLD - T206 Collins and Griffith SGC graded.
posts.post_content:
The pair have sold - A couple of SGC graded T206 Portraits, both HOF.

T206 Eddie Collins Piedmont 350 - SGC 2  SOLD

T206 Clark Griffith SC 150 Factory 649 overstrike - SGC 2  Sold

Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
